name: FTableRowStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an STableRow

SelectorFocusedBrush: Brush used as a selector when a row is focused
ActiveHoveredBrush: Brush used when a selected row is active and hovered
ActiveBrush: Brush used when a selected row is active
InactiveHoveredBrush: Brush used when a selected row is inactive and hovered
InactiveBrush: Brush used when a selected row is inactive
ParentRowBackgroundBrush: Brush used for the top parent row
ParentRowBackgroundHoveredBrush: Brush used for the top parent row and row is hovered
EvenRowBackgroundHoveredBrush: Brush used when an even row is hovered
EvenRowBackgroundBrush: Brush used when an even row is in its normal state
OddRowBackgroundHoveredBrush: Brush used when an odd row is hovered
OddRowBackgroundBrush: Brush to used when an odd row is in its normal state
TextColor: Text color used for all rows
SelectedTextColor: Text color used for the selected row
DropIndicator_Above: Brush used to provide feedback that a user can drop above the hovered row.
DropIndicator_Onto: Brush used to provide feedback that a user can drop onto the hovered row.
DropIndicator_Below: Brush used to provide feedback that a user can drop below the hovered row.
ActiveHighlightedBrush: Brush used when a highlighted row is active
InactiveHighlightedBrush: Brush used when a highlighted row is inactive and hovered
